Text: Glocap Selected Favorite Headhunter by ForbescomDear Mark I hope that you are well Glocap Legal Search is one of the fastest growing inhouse legal recruiting firms in the nation We have worked very hard to create a truly unique and powerful legal recruiting company and we were gratified recently when Forbescom selected us the best recruiting website in the country We recruit for Fortune companies major financial institutions consulting companies investment banks and many other public and private companies of all sizes I am writing to ask for your help Do you know anyone who might be interested in hearing more about us I have briefly summarized a very small sample of the many truly outstanding prescreened attorneys available through our unique service We have many more in all practice areas and experience levels Call me if you would like to discuss how we can be of service to your company Attorneys available now include Northwestern University School of Law cum laude graduate has over years experience working on computer software intellectual property and internet related issues with particular emphasis on ecommerce and complex licensing This very highly regarded attorney seeks a corporation or financial institution that needs in house counsel for domestic andor international tech law matters Midwest preferred This graduate of a top law school also has an MBA magna cum laude from a top business school Superb experience as a corporate attorney at a top firm with an emphasis in entertainment law Currently GC of an entertainment company with great corporate securities intellectual property and corporate governance matters Very savvy and articulate Willing to work on either coast Texas or Florida A truly uniquely credentialed attorney who graduated Stanford Law School and has a graduate degree from Columbia this candidate is also a shared recipient of the Pulitzer Prize for investigative reporting and writing Currently a litigator at a top law firm this attorney has the intelligence writing ability and work ethic to enhance any companys litigation department Fluent in Spanish Georgetown Law Center cum laude and Stanford undergraduate has over four years experience advising both private and public companies on general businesscorporate matters as well as venture and debt financings licensing mergers and acquisitons and public offerings Terrific experience in securities and corporate counseling Available either in California or East Coast A talented attorney with over eight years experience doing project finance and lending mergers and acquisitions and capital markets transactions at two very prominent law firms This Russian speaking attorney has represented investors lenders and multilateral agencies in power energy and natural resources industry sectors as well as financial services IT and telecom clients in a wide variety of m a matters This graduate of a highly regarded law school has over five years of solid general corporate experience Great drafting skills and superb presence this candidate will be a very welcome addition to any in house legal staff that seeks an intelligent hard working and very well trained corporate generalist Attorney who graduated first in his law class is practicing corporate restructuring and reorganization at one of New Yorks premier law firms Four years experience in all aspects of distressed debt transactions including asset sales plans of reorganization assetbased financings crossborder insolvency issues and strategic distressed acquisitions Seeking inhouse or investment banking position Yale Law School Princeton University magna cum laude Senior VP of one of top financial institutions in the world this attorney has played a leading legal business integration and managerial role in acquisitons joint ventures equity investments and divestitures Also has broad epxerience in securities law at a top law firm Very well spoke and personable this candidate is interested in a senior businessGC type position NY metro area Yale University magna cum laude Harvard Law School cum laude candidate with three years transactional experience at premier law firm before leaving to become general counsel at a new media company Has broad corporate real estate and and technology experience Exceedlingly smart conscientious and energetic This candidate will be an enormous asset to any company that hires him Wants NY area only UChicago Law School over five years extraordinary experience at both a top law firm and a premier incubator Practice areas include corporate securities intellectual property mergers acquisitions venture capital financings and technology Dynamic very highly regarded attorney also speaks mandarin chinese Wants inhouse or legalbusiness position in Southern California only This is just a very small sample of the attorneycandidates that we work with We can of course tailor our search to meet any specifications that you wish Feel free to call us to discuss our service or to refer us to a colleague that might be interested in hearing more about us or to obtain references from our clients I hope I will be speaking with you soon Thank you for taking the time to consider our service Steven J Greenberg Esq Managing Partner Glocap Legal Search LLC Carnegie Hall Tower West th Street th Floor New York New York phone fax wwwglocaplawcom

Glocap Legal Search Attorneys Available for InhoDear Jeffrey I hope that you are well Over the past six months Glocap Legal Search has solidified its position as the nations premier inhouse legal recruiting firm We have worked very hard to create a truly unique and powerful legal recruiting company Glocaps selection by Forbescom as the best recruiting website in the country was gratifying but even more important are the positive reviews that we regularly receive from our clients We recruit for Fortune companies major financial institutions consulting companies investment banks and many other public and private companies of all sizes I am writing to ask for your help Do you know anyone who might be interested in hearing more about us I have briefly summarized a very small sample of the many truly outstanding prescreened attorneys available through our unique service We have many more in all practice areas and experience levels Call me if you would like to discuss how we can be of service to your company Attorneys available now include Northwestern University School of Law cum laude graduate has over years experience working on computer software intellectual property and internet related issues with particular emphasis on ecommerce and complex licensing This very highly regarded attorney seeks a corporation or financial institution that needs in house counsel for domestic andor international tech law matters Midwest preferred Currently a Managing Director of a major investment bank this prominent attorney has also served as one of the top partners at an elite bluechip law firm The attorney seeks new challenges as a GCCFOVP of Business Development at a media telecommunications or related company An awesome talent who has been extremely successful at each stage of their career A truly uniquely credentialed attorney who graduated Stanford Law School and has a graduate degree from Columbia this candidate is also a shared recipient of the Pulitzer Prize for investigative reporting and writing Currently a litigator at a top law firm this attorney has the intelligence writing ability and work ethic to enhance any companys litigation department Fluent in Spanish Georgetown Law Center cum laude and Stanford undergraduate has over four years experience advising both private and public companies on general businesscorporate matters as well as venture and debt financings licensing mergers and acquisitons and public offerings Terrific experience in securities and corporate counseling Available either in California or East Coast A talented attorney with over eight years experience doing project finance and lending mergers and acquisitions and capital markets transactions at two very prominent law firms This Russian speaking attorney has represented investors lenders and multilateral agencies in power energy and natural resources industry sectors as well as financial services IT and telecom clients in a wide variety of m a matters This graduate of a highly regarded law school has over five years of solid general corporate experience Great drafting skills and superb presence this candidate will be a very welcome addition to any in house legal staff that seeks an intelligent hard working and very well trained corporate generalist Attorney who graduated first in his law class is practicing corporate restructuring and reorganization at one of New Yorks premier law firms Four years experience in all aspects of distressed debt transactions including asset sales plans of reorganization assetbased financings crossborder insolvency issues and strategic distressed acquisitions Seeking inhouse or investment banking position Yale Law School Princeton University magna cum laude Senior VP of one of top financial institutions in the world this attorney has played a leading legal business integration and managerial role in acquisitons joint ventures equity investments and divestitures Also has broad epxerience in securities law at a top law firm Very well spoke and personable this candidate is interested in a senior businessGC type position NY metro area Yale University magna cum laude Harvard Law School cum laude candidate with three years transactional experience at premier law firm before leaving to become general counsel at a new media company Has broad corporate real estate and and technology experience Exceedlingly smart conscientious and energetic This candidate will be an enormous asset to any company that hires him Wants NY area only UChicago Law School over five years extraordinary experience at both a top law firm and a premier incubator Practice areas include corporate securities intellectual property mergers acquisitions venture capital financings and technology Dynamic very highly regarded attorney also speaks mandarin chinese Wants inhouse or legalbusiness position in Southern California only This is just a very small sample of the attorneycandidates that we work with We can of course tailor our search to meet any specifications that you wish Feel free to call us to discuss our service or to refer us to a colleague that might be interested in hearing more about us or to obtain references from our clients I hope I will be speaking with you soon Thank you for taking the time to consider our service Steven J Greenberg Esq Managing Partner Glocap Legal Search LLC Carnegie Hall Tower West th Street th Floor New York New York phone fax wwwglocaplawcom To be removed from any future mailing of this kind from Glocap please reply to this email with remove in the subject line Thank you To be removed from any future mailing of this kind from Glocap please reply to this email with remove in the subject line Thank you Message sent by Steven J Greenberg Glocap Legal Search LLC Tel Fax Email Glocap provides financial legal and technical recruiting to private equity firms their portfolio companies and Fortune companies Forbes selected Glocap as its Favorite Headhunter in its Best of the Web issue published in Spring Click on bowbcreviewjhtmlid for more details Glocap is also the exclusive career partner of Venture Economics publisher of Private Equity Week VC Journal Buyouts The IPO Reporter etc and the Daily Deal

Glocap Voted Favorite Headhunter by ForbesGerald Glocap Legal Search is one of the fastest growing inhouse legal recruiting firms in the nation We have worked very hard to create a unique and powerful legal recruiting company and we were gratified recently when Forbes ranked Glocap its Favorite Headhunter To read the review which appeared in the spring issue of Forbescom magazine click on aspcategoryaspcategoryHeadhunters Glocap recruits for Fortune companies major financial institutions consulting companies investment banks and many other public and private companies of all sizes I am writing to ask for your help Do you know anyone or any department at your company that may need Attorneys and could use our services If so I would be grateful for the referral To give you an idea of the kinds of candidates that we place I have briefly summarized a very small sample of the outstanding prescreened attorneys available through Glocap Attorneys we are working with now include Harvard Law Magna cum laude Harvard College magna cum laude General Counsel at both a VC incubator and a major brokerdealer Former VP of a major bank with expertise in all GC functions including managed risk compliance acquisition finance securities corporate HR issues real estate litigation A wellspoken thoughtful attorney with about total years of legal experience is seeking new challenges Will relocate Yale Law School Princeton University magna cum laude Senior VP of one of top financial institutions in the world this attorney has played a leading legal business integration and managerial role in acquisitions joint ventures equity investments and divestitures Also has broad experience in securities law at a top law firm Very well spoke and personable this candidate is interested in a senior businessGC type position NY metro area UChicago Law School over five years extraordinary experience at both a top law firm and a premier incubator Practice areas include corporate securities intellectual property mergers acquisitions venture capital financings and technology Dynamic very highly regarded attorney also speaks mandarin Chinese Wants inhouse or legalbusiness position in Southern California only Attorney who graduated first in his law class is practicing corporate restructuring and reorganization at one of New Yorks premier law firms Four years experience in all aspects of distressed debt transactions including asset sales plans of reorganization assetbased financings crossborder insolvency issues and strategic distressed acquisitions Seeking inhouse or investment banking position Duke Law School graduate cum laude with substantial coursework in business school has two years experience as senior analyst at a top consulting firm and is currently practicing law at a very prominent law firm where he specializes in mergers and acquisitions This very personable hardworking attorney is seeking a position at a wellrun company that will allow him to utilize his impressive skill set in a dynamic and challenging environment Will relocate to the Northeast or the West Coast Dartmouth College graduate holds JD and MBA from top schools This dynamic articulate attorney has two years experience at both a premier accounting firm and a highly respected law firm doing corporate finance m a structuring complex transactions and tax planning He has also served as General Counsel and corporate secretary at an investor relations company He has the skills personality and energy to be a major asset to an entrepreneurial company that seeks a general counsel or a more established company that seeks a mid to highlevel counsel This Columbia Law graduate Harlan Fisk Stone Scholar has over six years of experience in corporate law primarily involving venture capital financing mergers acquisitions and initial and followon public offerings Currently on West Coast willing to relocate for an inhouse position that utilizes hisher broad corporate experience and a very professional and polished demeanor University of Pennsylvania Law School graduate has three years of superb experience as a corporate associate at a preeminent law firm responsible for corporate and securities matters for many major financial institutions and investment banks Also has corporate m a and securities experience working at a Fortune technology company This candidate is looking to relocate to the East Coast Have foreign language skills Georgetown Law Center graduate has six years awesome experience in the technology practice group of a major law firm Has simultaneously served as business development consultant to an Internet startup company Wants inhouse legal or business position in a technologytelecommunications company Yale University magna cum laude Harvard Law School cum laude candidate with three years transactional experience at premier law firm before leaving to become general counsel at a new media company Has broad corporate real estate and technology experience Exceedingly smart conscientious and energetic This candidate will be an enormous asset to any company that hires him Wants NY area only This is just a small sample of the attorneycandidates that we work with We can of course tailor our search to meet any specifications that you wish Feel free to call us to discuss our service or to refer us to a colleague that might be interested in hearing more about us or to obtain references from our clients I hope I will be speaking with you soon Thank you for taking the time to consider our service Steven J Greenberg Esq Managing Partner Glocap Legal Search LLC Carnegie Hall Tower West th Street th Floor New York New York tel wwwglocaplawcom Glocap provides finance legal and technical recruiting deal sourcing and strategic funding introductions to Venture CapitalLBOPrivate Equity firms and their portfolio companies
